title: Contemporary 2 Bedroom Apartment
app_fee: $30 cash application/credit check fee per adult (18 years & up).
posting_body: Five minutes from Eagle Rock, five minutes from Silverlake, and 10 minutes to Glendale and Downtown.
Ultimate privacy with beautiful views and a natural breeze (building located on top of a hill).
Quartz Counter Top with cook top/bar stool island
Dance chrome kitchen faucet and sink
updated Cabinets, drawers with new handles
Independent AC/Heating, ceiling fan in bedroom
vanity, mirror cab, tiled shower, shower head/faucet
Very quiet environment with secured access
Street parking with NO street cleaning or restrictions
Must have a credit score of 700 or greater
Please do NOT email, call for showing time:
*Images are not of exact unit, but very similar.
